item.title: US-395 North - NV-208 Junction
item.description: US-395 north at NV-208 east to Yerrington. Continue north on US-395 for Carson City.

item.title: End NV-208 West at US-395
item.description: End NV-208 West at US-395. Turn right for US-395 north to Carson City; left for US-395 south to Bishop (California).

item.title: NV-208 West Approaching US-395
item.description: NV-208 West approaching US-395. Use US-395 north for Carson City; use US-395 south for Bishop (California).

item.title: NV-208 West at NV-338
item.description: NV-208 west at NV-338 south to Bridgeport (California). Merge right to continue west on NV-208 to Wellington and US-395.

item.title: NV-208 West at NV-824
item.description: NV-208 west at NV-824. Turn left to continue west on NV-208 for Wellington and Bridgeport (California).

item.description: NV-208 west at NV-339. Turn right for NV-339 north to Yerington and Silver Springs. Turn left to continue west on NV-208 for Wellington and US-395 Jct.

item.title: Alt. US-95 North Approaching NV-208
item.description: Alt. US-95 North Approaching NV-208 in Yerington. Turn right to continue north on Alt. US-95.

item.title: NV-208 North Approaching Alt. US-95
item.description: NV-208 North approaching Alt. US-95 in Yerrington. Use Alt. US-95 South (straight ahead) for Hawthorne and Las Vegas. Use Alt. US-95 North (left) for Fernley.

item.title: NV-208 North Approaching Alt. US-95
item.description: NV-208 north approaching Alt. US-95 north in Yerrington. Below the Alt. US-95 shield is a Nevada post mile marker. Nevada state and US highways do not have traditional mile markers, but instead have these post mile markers. The mileage on these markers reset at each county line. The top line is the route type, in this case SR (State Route). The next line is the two character county abbreviation - LY for Lyon County.

item.title: End NV-208 North
item.description: End NV-208 north at Alt. US-95 junction in Yerrington.

item.title: NV-208 North at NV-824
item.description: NV-208 north at NV-824 in Smith Valley. Turn right to continue on NV-208 towards Yerrington and Las Vegas.
